TypeInfo
public final class RequiredPrecisionType
extends AbstractType

Final TypeInfo for types having a required length parameter.

Field Detail

_defaultLength

private final java.lang.Integer _defaultLength
Default length parameter from ddl.properties file. Will be used if no specific length is specified at field mapping.
